page.title: 13FARMING-3. A LANDOWNER
page.content:
An example of a farm run by the landowner himself is{Park View Farm} owned by Mr Mason.The farmhouse and buildings are in Finghall but his fields lie to the east of the village.
He has{53.75 acres}of land which he uses for mixed farming.He has some livestock and uses 21 acres of the land to grow crops.
The{crop}that he grows is Spring Barley on the 21 acres.The whole of this crop is for use on the farm and not for the purpose of sale.
Mr Mason keeps both{cattle}and {sheep.}He has 26 Friesian cows for milking.There are also sheep on the farm,41 ewes(Mashams,Mules and Swaledales) and 2 Suffolk tups.
